org.cloudcoder.daemon.example

Class ExampleDaemonController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudcoder.daemon.DaemonController
      • org.cloudcoder.daemon.example.ExampleDaemonController

  • public class ExampleDaemonController
extends DaemonController
    An example main class to start, shut down, and control your daemon process. If you are creating an executable jar file, a class like this one should be the main class.
    Author:
    David Hovemeyer
